Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Lifestyle | Wildlife
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: January 21, 2013

The Wild Things is a documentary series which takes offers a different view on the world around us and looks at how plants help to offer an understanding of the changing British wildlife. The series is presented by Chris Myers and his Labrador Lottie. They are joined by one of country's best botanists, Dr Trevor Dines, and lichenologist Sally Eaton. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34131)
